Auth.PruneJob.Title.other: Prune revoked tokens and expired reset password keys

ResetPassword.Success.EmailSent.other: An email has been sent to you with further instructions

ResetPassword.Err.Unknown.other: Oops, something wrong happened - Please relaunch reset password process

ResetPassword.Err.TokenExpired.other: Token is expired, please follow again the reset password process!

ResetPassword.Err.TokenNotCorresponding.other: Token does not correspond to this user identifier!

ResetPassword.Err.ResetFailed.other: There was an error while trying to set new password!

ResetPassword.Success.ResetFinished.other: Your password has successfully been reset, you can now return to the login page!
